roomTypes.deluxeDoubleTwin: Deluxe Double or Twin Room with Pool View

roomDetails.description: Eightfold Urban Villas offers luxurious accommodations surrounded by tropical greenery. It features a spectacular outdoor pool, massage services, fully air-conditioning coffee shop and a classic modern fine-dining restaurant. The modern Khmer-style units are well-furnished, featuring Wi-Fi access and flat-screen TV. Private balconies have outdoor seating, with views of the pool or surrounding greenery. Room service is available until 9pm. A fridge and safe are provided for convenience. A tour desk at Eightfold Urban helps with travel arrangements. The staff at front desk can be any of assistance 24/7.

items.Entire unit located on ground floor: Entire unit located on ground floor
